quote: Nothing in biology makes sense except in the light of evolution.
author: Theodosius Dobzhansky

quote: Biology is the only science where multiplication is the same thing as division.
author: Unknown

quote: It is not the strongest of the species that survives, nor the most intelligent; it is the one most adaptable to change.
author: Charles Darwin

quote: DNA is like a computer program but far, far more advanced than any software ever created.
author: Bill Gates
